body.name: Utopia Bedding Zippered Mattress Encasement Full XL - 100% Waterproof and Bed Bug Proof Mattress Protector - Absorbent, Six-Sided Mattress Cover (Pack of 2)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: MATTRESS ENCASEMENT - Fits Full XL size mattress perfectly with dimensions 54 inches by 80 inches; 13 inches deep pocket
KNITTED POLYESTER FABRIC - Stretchable knitted polyester fabric fits the mattress easily and gives a comfortable feel while you sleep
ZIPPERED COVER - Zippered cover with zip secures the mattress from 360 degrees; it protects the mattress

100% WATERPROOF PROTECTION - Mattress encasement protects your mattress from unwelcome spills and keeps your mattress clean and safe. High quality TPU backing on all sides resist any leakage into the mattress.
EASY CARE - Machine washable; tumble dry for easy maintenance; Note: Packaging might slightly vary
BED BUG AND DUST MITE PROOF: High quality zipper completely seals off an encasement and protects against bed bugs and dust mites.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome product! Make sure you have a friend or two when putting it on!
reviews.reviewText: I am writing this review with absolute delight, having experienced firsthand the incredible durability and protection offered by the King Size Mattress Encasement. This waterproof marvel has proven to be nothing short of amazing, and I can confidently say it's one of the best investments I've made for my home.Unrivaled Waterproof Shield:The waterproof feature of this mattress encasement is genuinely a game-changer. It has safeguarded my mattress against spills, accidents, and unexpected disasters, ensuring that it remains pristine regardless of what life throws at it. The peace of mind that comes with knowing my bed is protected from liquids, stains, and allergens is invaluable.Durable Beyond Expectations:I've owned this mattress encasement for years, and its durability has completely blown me away. It has withstood regular use, washing, and even a rather dramatic encounter with a particularly disgruntled ex-boyfriend! Despite his immature antics of throwing it out in the mud and rain, this encasement emerged unscathed. Its resilience in the face of such a ridiculous situation only reinforced my confidence in its durability.A Family Favorite:This mattress encasement has become a staple in my home. Every bed in my house is now adorned with one. Its practicality and reliability have made it a family favorite, and it's unanimously agreed that no bed in our household should be without this essential layer of protection.Easy to Maintain:Aside from its impressive durability, this encasement is remarkably easy to maintain. It washes like a dream, maintaining its quality and effectiveness even after multiple cycles. The hassle-free care adds to its appeal, making it a practical choice for busy households.Conclusion:In conclusion, the King Size Mattress Encasement is an indispensable asset for any home. Its waterproof capabilities, unmatched durability, and ease of maintenance make it a standout product in its category. It has saved my mattress from countless potential disasters and proven its mettle against unexpected challenges. If you're looking for a reliable, long-lasting, waterproof solution to protect your mattress, look no further. This encasement is amazing, and it has my wholehearted recommendation. Don't just consider it; make it a part of your home, and experience the peace of mind it brings firsthand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A VERY GOOD MATTRESS PROTECTOR
reviews.reviewText: THIS UTOPIA BEDDING ZIPPERED MATTRESS ENCASEMENT IS GOOD. IT IS TRULY BREATHABLE AND NOISELESS. THE MATERIAL IS SOFT ON THE SKIN AND DOES NOT IRRITATE OUR SENSITIVE SKIN. IT DOES NOT CAUSE USE TO SWEAT AND VERY COOL TO LAY ON. IT WAS VERY EASY TO PUT ON THE MATTRESS. TWO PEOPLE PUT IT ON WITH NO PROBLEM AT ALL. I AM NOT ONE HUNDRED PERCENT SURE IT IS WATER RESISTANT BECAUSE WE HAVE NOT HAD WATER ON IT YET, BUT IT DOES THE JOB OF PROTECTING THE MATTRESS AND KEEPING IT NEW. THAT IS ALL WE WANT. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great and affordable
reviews.reviewText: This has worked to protect my new mattress.. it does appear to keep it dry . I don’t feel any different laying on it than the actual mattress. It’s as if it’s not even there. It fits snugly. The price was a bonus

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product. Fit great. Seams a little off, but great overall! :)
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Fit great. Seams a little off, but great overall! :) We kept trying to align the seams with the mattress, but it is a little off on one side. There is extra room in the encasement so it is fine. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Silly me cut my 14 inch King size memory foam mattress in half to make 2 XL twin mattresses. It worked like a charm, but I needed new mattress covers. These beauties blew me away. The fit PERFECTLY and the assembly was beyond simple. It’s rare that a project turns out as I imagined, but this was one for the books. SO pleased with the fit, feel, and price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to protect my new mattress for a short-term rental. I wanted something that was waterproof to protect the mattress from accidents and spills. It fits great (with lots of room to spare) and was very easy to put on. It washes well too. It's not at all bulky under the fitted sheet. I would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice product
reviews.reviewText: To be honest, I was concerned about putting the Cal King cover on the mattress. It does take two people as recommended in the instructions, but even as "senior citizens" we were able to quickly cover the mattress. The cover is waterproof and bug proof, but it has a nice feel which will allow the mattress to feel comfortable during the summer. I really like the strong velcro flap that covers the end of the zipper. I am very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good product
reviews.reviewText: It said it would take 2 people to install. I was able to put it on by myself. It was very easy and has been working great!

Considering how much you can save by protecting your mattress (from bed bugs, acarians, liquid spills, etc) this is a very good investment at a reasonable price.The zipper is sturdy and conceived for maximum protection including a velcro closure at the end of the zipper. I was worried the PVC interior lining would be noisy (like plastic bed covers) but once installed you don't hear any crispy sound. It's just like a polyester cover, no plastic-y sensation.As per washing instructions on the packaging you can machine wash and tumble dry at low heat which is amazing since there is PVC inside ( I was afraid I would need some kind of special cleaning process). I will follow instructions to a T and will update to highly recommend if the product can sustain the washing process on the long run.
Resultó de buena calidad y durable
It is a very good product ,easy to fold water resistance.
1 week after. It seems to be good. Quality is ok for the price. Bought 2.
